post.description: Registers a new user and returns an access token for the user.

example: The email must be a valid email address.

post.description: Allows a user to log in using their email and password. If credentials are valid, a token is generated and returned.

example: The email must be a valid email address.

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to log out by deleting all of their tokens.

get.description: This endpoint returns a list of all categories.

message.example: You are not authorized to view categories.

post.description: This endpoint allows an authorized user to create a new category.

message.example: You are not authorized to create categories.

get.description: This endpoint returns the details of a specific category.

message.example: You are not authorized to view this category.

put.description: This endpoint allows an authorized user to update the details of a specific category.

message.example: You are not authorized to update this category.

delete.description: This endpoint allows an authorized user to delete a specific category.

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this category.

get.description: This endpoint returns a list of all comments.

message.example: You are not authorized to view comments.

post.description: This endpoint allows an authorized user to create a new comment.

message.example: You are not authorized to create comments.

get.description: This endpoint returns the details of a specific comment.

message.example: You are not authorized to view this comment.

put.description: This endpoint allows an authorized user to update the details of a specific comment.

message.example: You are not authorized to update this comment.

delete.description: This endpoint allows an authorized user to delete a specific comment.

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this comment.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all posts with pagination.

message.example: You are not authorized to view posts.

post.description: Allows an authorized user to create a new post.

content.example: This is the content of the post.

message.example: You are not authorized to create posts.

get.description: Returns the details of a specific post.

message.example: You are not authorized to view this post.

put.description: Allows an authorized user to update the details of a specific post.

example: The title must be at least 3 characters.
The content must be at least 10 characters.

message.example: You are not authorized to update this post.

delete.description: Allows an authorized user to delete a specific post.

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this post.

get.summary: Get like count of a post
get.description: Retrieves the total number of likes for a specific post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: ID of the post to get like count for

post.description: Allows a user to like a post. If the user is already authenticated and has not liked the post, the like is recorded.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: ID of the post to like

delete.description: Allows a user to remove their like from a post. If the user is authenticated and has liked the post, the like is removed.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: ID of the post to dislike

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all users.

post.description: Allows an authorized user to create a new user.

role_id.description: The role ID for the user

example: The email must be a valid email address.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific user by ID
get.description: Returns the details of a specific user. Authorization is required to view the user.

message.example: You are not authorized to view this user.

put.description: Allows an authorized user to update the details of a specific user.

example: The name field is required if included.
The email must be a valid email address.
The password must be at least 8 characters.

message.example: You are not authorized to update this user.

delete.description: Allows an authorized user to delete a specific user.

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this user.

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to like a specific post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: ID of the post to like

delete.description: Allows the authenticated user to remove their like from a specific post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: ID of the post to dislike

get.summary: Get the count of liked posts by the user
get.description: Returns the total number of posts liked by the authenticated user.

post.summary: Store a visit for a post
post.description: Records a visit for a specific post, ensuring the visit is not duplicated for the same IP on the same day.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: ID of the post to record the visit for

get.summary: Get the visit count for a post
get.description: Returns the total number of visits recorded for a specific post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: ID of the post to get visit count for
